thread.title: West Brom's James McClean leads tributes after Derry City captain Ryan McBride's death
thread.title_full: West Brom's James McClean leads tributes after Derry City captain Ryan McBride's death

author: Liam Corless
title: West Brom's James McClean leads tributes after Derry City captain Ryan McBride's death
text:
Sport West Brom's James McClean leads tributes after Derry City captain Ryan McBride's death McBridge died at the age of 27 on Sunday just a day after leading his team to a 4-0 win over Drogheda United Share Tributes have come flooding in for Ryan McBride following his sudden death (Photo: Â©INPHO/Tom Beary) Share Get football updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
West Brom winger James McClean led the tributes after former teammate Ryan McBride, the captain of Derry City , was found dead. 
McBride is believed to have passed away at home on Sunday just 24 hours after leading his team to a 4-0 win over Drogheda United in the Irish top flight. 
McClean used to play with McBride at Derry and shared a touching Instagram post after learning of his friend's death. 
He wrote: "Tonight we lost someone had to the privilege to play along aside but also got on well with of the field, a warrior that literally would throw his body on the line when he pulled on that Derry City jersey, a club that meant so much to him, but more importantly a big gentleman of the field.. sleep tight big man may god bless you and your family." Read More Instagram 
Shay Given wrote: "Terrible sad news to hear the passing @derrycityfc captain Ryan McBride, Thoughts & prayers are with his family & friends #RIPRYANMCBRIDE." 
Liverpool legend Robbie Fowler added: "Thoughts and prayers of all the family and friends of @derrycityfc captain Ryan mcbride... RIP." 
Chris Sutton tweeted: "Extremely sad news about the sudden death of Ryan Mcbride the captain of Derry City. Thoughts go out to his family." 
John Hartson wrote: "Terribly sad news hearing Derry City footballer Ryan McBride has passed away. Thoughts are with Ryan's family and close friends." 
The respective Twitter accounts of West Ham, Stoke, Hull, Arsenal, Celtic also carried messages of condolence. Like us on Facebook
